name: Red Delicious
description: A sweet apple with a dark red skin and elongated shape. One of the most widely cultivated apples in the world.

name: Granny Smith
description: A tart and crisp apple with a green skin and round shape. Originally developed in Australia.

name: Golden Delicious
description: A very sweet apple with yellowish-green skin and round shape. Originally developed in West Virginia, United States.

name: Honeycrisp
description: A crisp apple with a red and yellow skin and round shape. It was developed by the University of Minnesota.

name: Braeburn
description: A sweet and slightly tart apple with a red and yellow skin and oval shape. Originally developed in New Zealand.

name: Gala
description: A sweet, mild-flavored and crisp apple with a red skin and round shape. Originally developed in New Zealand.

name: Pink Lady
description: A sweet-tart and tangy apple with a red and yellow skin and elongated shape. There are actually several apple cultivars that are branded as Pink Lady.
